about_the_game:
Explore Hermit's Marshlands:

-Play through both objective sets in the second biome from the full game.
-Wade through the rich river run offs and lush wetlands that make up the basin of Hermit's Thumb Peninsula.

Meet the Marshlands lurking Under-lord

-Sneak through the sprawling Cave system that hides under the Marshlands
-Face off against the the Cave Dweller, a creepy bag wearing resident of the swamp biome.

Interact with some of the biome specific mechanics:

-Go for a swim and catch schools of minnows with your hand crafted fishing net.
-Chase down salamanders with your trusty poking stick, or shoot them with your bow and arrows.

Learn by doing:

-Learn how to make a minnow offering for the stone shrine, the biomes main point of interest.
-Gather biome specific resources like snowberries and willow vines.
-Use these resources to craft stuff you need to craft more stuff!

Just a taste of the full game:

-Play through one of twelve objective sets from the full game.
-Explore one of six different biomes.
-Try out just a handful of the many mechanics from the full game.
-Steep yourself in the ambiance of a strange world with lots of strange characters and stories to come in the full game.

Updated with many new improvements from the main game

-The Demo now has all the QOL and stability changes that have gone into the main game post launch.
-For a full list of changes, visit the news page in the comunity hub.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains partial nudity and mild violence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended

short_description: Crows have downed your plane and you are trapped at the far end of a remote peninsula in northern British Columbia. You must craft the necessary tools to contend with the local eccentrics and find your way back to civilization.
